org.lenskit.mooc.nonpers.mean

Class DampedItemMeanModelProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.mooc.nonpers.mean.DampedItemMeanModelProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.inject.Provider<ItemMeanModel>

    public class DampedItemMeanModelProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.inject.Provider<ItemMeanModel>
    Provider class that builds the mean rating item scorer, computing damped item means from the ratings in the DAO.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DampedItemMeanModelProvider(org.lenskit.data.dao.DataAccessObject dao, double damping)
      Constructor for the mean item score provider.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DampedItemMeanModelProvider

        @Inject
public DampedItemMeanModelProvider(org.lenskit.data.dao.DataAccessObject dao,
                                            @MeanDamping
                                            double damping)
        Constructor for the mean item score provider.

        The @Inject annotation tells LensKit to use this constructor.

        Parameters:
        dao - The data access object (DAO), where the builder will get ratings. The @Transient annotation on this parameter means that the DAO will be used to build the model, but the model will not retain a reference to the DAO. This is standard procedure for LensKit models.
        damping - The damping factor for Bayesian damping. This is number of fake global-mean ratings to assume. It is provided as a parameter so that it can be reconfigured. See the file damped-mean.groovy for how it is used.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public ItemMeanModel get()
        Construct an item mean model.

        The Provider.get() method constructs whatever object the provider class is intended to build.

        Specified by:
        get in interface javax.inject.Provider<ItemMeanModel>
        Returns:
        The item mean model with mean ratings for all items.
